titleStmt.title: Cromwell's bloody slaughter-house, or, his damnable designes laid and practised by him and his negro's, in contriving the murther of His sacred Majesty King Charles I, discovered by a person of honor.
titleStmt.author: Gauden, John, 1605-1662.
